import React from "react"; import MealList from "./mealList" let eatingHabit = "Wurstliebhaber" const handleChange = (event) => { console.log(event) if(event.target.id === "Vegetarisch/Vegan"){ document.getElementById("mealList").setEatingHabit("Vegetarisch/Vegan") console.log("inVeg") eatingHabit = "Vegetarisch/Vegan" document.getElementById("Wurstliebhaber").checked = false document.getElementById("Vegetarisch/Vegan").checked = true }else{ eatingHabit = "Wurstliebhaber" document.getElementById("Wurstliebhaber").checked = true document.getElementById("Vegetarisch/Vegan").checked = false } } function CreateOrder(){ console.log("inOrder") return(
